sf probe
sf write 0x8c000000 0x0 0x1f4000
sf write 0x83000000 0x1f4000 0x19000
sf write 0x86800000 0x20d000 0x900000
sf write 0x83800000 0xb0d000 0x1400000




sf probe
sf read 0x83000000 0x1f4000 0x19000
sf read 0x86800000 0x20d000 0x900000
sf read 0x83800000 0xb0d000 0x900000
edit bootargs
console=ttymxc0,115200 root=/dev/ram0 rootfstype=ramfs initrd=0x85000000
bootz 0x86800000 0x83800000 0x83000000
